item.title: PEGASYSTEMS INC 10-K
item.description: PEGASYSTEMS INC, which is in the Services-Computer Processing & Data Preparation [7374] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 15, 2023 had 24118 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
